name: Kid Hallow (Hamumu, SpaceManiac)
description:
No plot required.  This is an action/puzzle game all about slipping on a variety of Halloween costumes to get past horrifying monsters that will haunt your nightmares.  Each costume has unique abilities and plays like a whole different kind of game, from action-slasher to puzzle-solving.  Build your own levels using the extremely simple level editor, and automatically share them with the world! Rate and compete on thousands of levels created by your fellow players.

Bonus! Includes 9 more costumes and dozens of enemies and objects from the Dumb Pack, Winter Pack, and Fantasy Pack. Play as Bouapha, a Wizard with fire and ice powers, the fattest Santa Claus you've ever seen, and more!
